modName: How to Import Models as Skyrim Weapons
summary: A simple guide for people new to modding.
descriptionHtml:
Other Tutorials:
---------------------
Importing Armour http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3746

Version 1.22
----------------
Rewrote whole tutorial
Added tutorial for adding textures

Update
----------
Added a youtube video, showing what I did in nifskope.

Version 1.01
----------------
Replaced all pictures and references to the oblivion fish model with my own model. 
Added working item ID the tutorial. 
Released the tutorial in Open Office and as a PDF 

Description
-----------------
Word Document
Open Office Document
PDF Document

A simple guide with plenty of pictures directed towards people who know little about modding.

Sword of Aeons Modeled by me

This tutorial teaches:
--------------------------------
How to use Nifskope

How to import a .nif .obj file into skyrim

This is my first tutorial, I hope you can follow it =)
author: Maniczombie

files.name: How to Import Weapons to Skyrim v 1-22
files.fileName: How to Import Weapons to Skyrim v 1-22-2158-1-22.rar
